name: @locatienet/api-client
description: Browser-ready UMD client for Locatienet API's
author: Remco Zut

scripts.generate: openapi --input https://services.locatienet.com/swagger/v1/swagger.json --output src/generated --client fetch --useUnionTypes --exportCore true --exportServices true --exportModels true
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:types && rollup -c
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run generate && npm run build:types && rollup -c
